title: Liberty Needs Glasses
lyrics:
pages 134 & 135
Excuse me but Lady Liberty needs glasses
And so does Mrs. Justice by her side
Both the broads R blind as bats
Stumbling thru the system
Justice bumped into Mutulu and
Trippin' on Geronimo Pratt
But stepped right over 
Oliver
And his crooked partner 
Ronnie
Justice stubbed her Big Toe on 
Mandela
And liberty was misquoted by the Indians
Slavery was a learning phase
Forgotten without a verdict
While Justice is on a rampage
4 endangered surviving Black males
I mean really if anyone really valued life
And cared about the masses
They'd take 'em both 2 Pen Optical
And get 2 pairs of glasses
